name: signature tree generation based on MSA

screenshots.caption: generated signature tree given five polymorphic worms and nine polymorphic worm variants

short_description:
Sigtreegen can be used for worm/attack signature generation, unkown prototocal analysis, common sequence analysis etc.

Sigtreegen not only generates regular-expression-like signatures for sequences e.g. polymorphic worm samples, but also organizes the signatures into a tree structure, called "signature tree", based on the formally defined “more specific” relation for simplified regular expression signatures. 
For more information, please refer to published paper "Signature Tree Generation for Polymorphic Worms".
summary: generate signature tree based on multiple sequence alignment
